channel.title: Matching Function on Ava Francesca Battocchio
channel.description: Recent content in Matching Function on Ava Francesca Battocchio

item.title: Unemployment
item.description: This course presents a matching model of unemployment and uses it to study unemployment fluctuations, job rationing, and labor market policies.

item.title: Slackish Business Cycles
item.description: This book reviews facts about business cycles, develops a matching model to explain them, and discusses how monetary and fiscal policy can stabilize them.
